item.title: High-Frequency Ultrafast Ultrasound Micro-Doppler Imaging for Finger Tendon Neovascularity Assessment
item.author: sirichiu8632@gmail.com (Siri Chiu)
item.description: I propose a microvascular imaging algorithm that can clearly visualize the vascular tree structure of mouse kidneys and neovascularity information in injured finger tendons, with maximum resolution reaching 35Î¼m diameter.
